channel.title: Open Source on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Contributions
item.description: I have contributed to open source in the following places: Call for Code Achieve millisecond level time sync with NTP on the ESP32. PR#40: Adopt the ESPNtpClient library setup pio build workflow for WatsonIOT in PR#39. GSoC 2021 Tried to add librobotcontrol support to the BeagleBone AI in PR#204. Added a device tree overlay for the audio cape on the BeagleBone AI using the Cape Compatiblity layer and merged to the official BeagleBoard-Device Trees repo in PR#33.

item.title: GSoC2021
item.description: GSoC2021: Bela support for BeagleBone AI Bela is a hardware and software system for creating beautiful interaction with sensors and sound. This project proposes to provide restructuring and improvement of existing Bela Software Code to allow for compatibility and easier transition to newer TI chips (like in the BBAI). About Student Name: Dhruva Gole Mentors: ï»¿Giulio Moro, Stephen Arnold and Robert Manzke GSoC Entry link: GSoC entry #5697403266531328 Wiki: BB.
